mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotplace (city_no, hp_name, hp_address, hp_detail_adr,hp_content, hp_tag , hp_homepage, hp_holiday, hp_fee, hp_img, hp_theme) VALUES ( #{city_no:INTEGER}, #{hp_name:VARCHAR}, #{hp_address:VARCHAR}, #{hp_detail_adr:VARCHAR}, #{hp_content:VARCHAR}, #{hp_tag:VARCHAR}, #{hp_homepage:VARCHAR}, #{hp_holiday:VARCHAR}, #{hp_fee:VARCHAR}, #{hp_img:VARCHAR}, #{hp_theme:VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: UPDATE hotplace SET hp_del_check = TRUE WHERE hp_no = #{hp_no:INTEGER} and hp_del_check = FALSE
mapper.update: UPDATE hotplace SET city_no = #{city_no:INTEGER}, hp_name = #{hp_name:VARCHAR}, hp_address = #{hp_address:VARCHAR}, hp_detail_adr = #{hp_detail_adr:VARCHAR}, hp_content = #{hp_content:VARCHAR}, hp_tag = #{hp_tag:VARCHAR}, hp_homepage = #{hp_homepage:VARCHAR}, hp_holiday = #{hp_holiday:VARCHAR}, hp_fee = #{hp_fee:VARCHAR}, hp_img = #{hp_img:VARCHAR}, hp_theme = #{hp_theme:VARCHAR}, hp_del_check = #{hp_del_check:BOOLEAN} WHERE hp_no = #{hp_no:INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM hotplace WHERE hp_no = #{hp_no:INTEGER} AND hp_del_check = false
